Subject: New poll for nbwrpg 
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit


Enter your vote today!  A new poll has been created for the 
nbwrpg group:

Should we create an "Accepted Weapon 
list" in addition to the Banned weapon 
list? (Accepted weapon list would be 
accompanied by a little text going 
something like this: "If you want to 
bring in any other weapons, contact the 
council, and they will review your 
proposal.") NOTE: More refining polls 
will follow if Yes gets more votes than 
No. 

  o Yes. 
  o No. 
  o Unsure. 


To vote, please visit the following web page:

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/nbwrpg/polls 

Note: Please do not reply to this message. Poll votes are 
not collected via email. To vote, you must go to the Yahoo! Groups 
web site listed above.

Thanks!
